text: eNCA (also referred to as eNews Channel Africa) is a 24-hour news channel in South Africa. It was launched in 2008 and broadcasts on DStv channel 403 and GOtv chanel 43. South African police gun down striking miners - Telegraph eNews 24-hour channel takes to the airwaves The eNews eNews Channel expanding to UK Chanel 24 eNews launches 'daunting' eNCA eNCA == References == Category:Television channels in South Africa Category:2008 establishments
title: ENCA
